filterParamNew.name: geographic_region_prism
filterParamNew.help: Select observations based on the subcounty where the participant lives.

filterParamNew.name: visits_visitage_metadata_prism
filterParamNew.help: Select the age of the participants at the time of their clinical observations.

filterParamNew.name: participants_prism
filterParamNew.help: Select participants based on their characteristics.

filterParamNew.name: households_prism
filterParamNew.help: Select observations based on the household characteristics where the participant lives.

filterParamNew.name: visits_prism
filterParamNew.help: Select observations based on their observation characteristics.

dateRangeParam.name: visit_date
dateRangeParam.help: "select the earliest and latest dates to include for identifying observations and computing mosquito counts."

numberRangeParam.name: num_relative_events
numberRangeParam.help: Set the range of the number of matching observations in order to keep or remove the observation from the previous step.

numberRangeParam.name: days_between
numberRangeParam.help: Set the range of days between observations to compare to observations selected in the previous step

enumParam.name: dateOperator
enumParam.help: Choose how to compare these two observations. Do you want to remove observations that have another observation within the specified time frame or keep them.

enumParam.name: date_direction
enumParam.help: Choose a direction for the corresponding observation. Will the matching observation be before or after relative to the first observation.

flatVocabParam.name: use_relative_visits
flatVocabParam.help: You MUST change this parameter to Yes in order to use relative observations! If you decide to not use relative observations, set this parameter to No and make certain "Keep or remove observations" is set to remove.

flatVocabParam.name: dateOperator_fv
flatVocabParam.prompt: Keep or Remove observations from previous step matching these criteria
flatVocabParam.help: Choose how to compare these two observations. Do you want to remove observations that have another observation within the specified time frame or keep them.

flatVocabParam.name: date_direction_fv
flatVocabParam.help: Choose a direction for the corresponding observation. Will the matching observation be before or after relative to the first observation.

filterParamNew.name: geographic_region_maled
filterParamNew.help: Select observations based on the participants subcounty where they live.

filterParamNew.name: participants_nf_maled
filterParamNew.help: Select participants based on their characteristics.

filterParamNew.name: households_nf_maled
filterParamNew.help: Select observations based on the household characteristics where the participants live.

filterParamNew.name: visits_nf_maled
filterParamNew.help: Select observations based on their observation characteristics.

filterParamNew.name: relative_visits_nf_maled
filterParamNew.help: Select related observations based on their characteristics.

sqlQuery.name: dateDirection
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT 'before' as display, 'after' as term, '>=' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'after' as display, 'before' as term, '<=' as internal from dual

sqlQuery.name: dateOperator
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT * from ( SELECT 'Remove' as display, 'remove' as term, 'MINUS' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'Keep' as display, 'keep' as term, 'INTERSECT' as internal from dual where $$use_relative_visits$$ = 1 ) ORDER by term desc

sqlQuery.name: useRelativeVisits
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT 'No' as term, 0 as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'Yes' as term, 1 as internal from dual

sqlQuery.name: RegionMetaData_prism
sqlQuery.sql: with idMap as ( select distinct io.input_pan_id as hh_id, io.output_pan_id as part_id, iov.output_pan_id as obs_id from ApidbTuning.D0ad509829ePANIO io, ApidbTuning.D0ad509829ePANIO iov where io.input_pan_type_source_id = 'PCO_0000024' and io.output_pan_type_source_id = 'EUPATH_0000096' and io.output_pan_id = iov.input_pan_id and iov.output_pan_type_source_id = 'EUPATH_0000738' ) select m.pan_id as internal, idMap.obs_id as internal_for_counts, m.property_source_id as ontology_term_name, m.string_value, m.number_value, m.date_value from ApidbTuning.D0ad509829eMetaData m, idMap where m.pan_id = idMap.hh_id and m.property_source_id in ('EUPATH_0000054','OBI_0001627','EUPATH_0000452')

sqlQuery.name: ClinicalVisitAgeMetaData_prism
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct m.pan_id as internal, m.pan_id as internal_for_counts, m.property_source_id as ontology_term_name, m.string_value, m.number_value, m.date_value from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$metadata m where m.pan_id in ($$geographic_region_prism$$) and m.property_source_id = 'EUPATH_0000113'

sqlQuery.name: HouseholdMetaData_prism
sqlQuery.sql: with part as ( select distinct io.input_pan_id as household_id, io.output_pan_id as part_id, iov.output_pan_id as obs_id from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$PANIO io, ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$PANIO iov where io.input_pan_type_source_id = 'PCO_0000024' and io.output_pan_type_source_id = 'EUPATH_0000096' and io.output_pan_id = iov.input_pan_id and iov.output_pan_type_source_id = 'EUPATH_0000738' and iov.output_pan_id in ($$participants_prism$$) ) select distinct m.pan_id as internal, part.obs_id as internal_for_counts, m.property_source_id as ontology_term_name, m.string_value, m.number_value, m.date_value from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$MetaData m, part where part.household_id = m.pan_id union select part.household_id as internal, part.obs_id as internal_for_counts, 'average anopheles' as ontology_term_name, null as string_value, nvl(mos.avg_anoph,0) as number_value, null as date_value from (select da.pan_id, round(avg(nvl(EUPATH_0000192,0)+nvl(EUPATH_0000193,0)+nvl(EUPATH_0000204,0)+nvl(EUPATH_0000205,0)),1) as avg_anoph from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$Households da, ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$PANIO io, ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$LightTraps la where da.pan_id = io.input_pan_id and la.pan_id = io.output_pan_id and la.OBI_0001619 >= $$visit_date.min$$ and la.OBI_0001619 <= $$visit_date.max$$ group by da.pan_id) mos, part where part.household_id = mos.pan_id(+)

sqlQuery.name: HouseholdMetaDataBkgd_prism
sqlQuery.sql: with part as ( select distinct io.input_pan_id as household_id, io.output_pan_id as part_id, iov.output_pan_id as obs_id from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$PANIO io, ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$PANIO iov where io.input_pan_type_source_id = 'PCO_0000024' and io.output_pan_type_source_id = 'EUPATH_0000096' and io.output_pan_id = iov.input_pan_id and iov.output_pan_type_source_id = 'EUPATH_0000738' ) select distinct m.pan_id as internal, part.obs_id as internal_for_counts, m.property_source_id as ontology_term_name, m.string_value, m.number_value, m.date_value from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$MetaData m, part where part.household_id = m.pan_id union select part.household_id as internal, part.obs_id as internal_for_counts, 'average anopheles' as ontology_term_name, null as string_value, nvl(mos.avg_anoph,0) as number_value, null as date_value from (select da.pan_id, round(avg(nvl(EUPATH_0000192,0)+nvl(EUPATH_0000193,0)+nvl(EUPATH_0000204,0)+nvl(EUPATH_0000205,0)),1) as avg_anoph from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$Households da, ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$PANIO io, ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$LightTraps la where da.pan_id = io.input_pan_id and la.pan_id = io.output_pan_id group by da.pan_id) mos, part where part.household_id = mos.pan_id(+)

sqlQuery.name: ParticipantMetaData_prism
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct m.pan_id as internal, iov.output_pan_id as internal_for_counts, m.property_source_id as ontology_term_name, m.string_value, m.number_value, m.date_value from (select min(EUPATH_0000113) as min_age, max(EUPATH_0000113) as max_age from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$Observations where pan_id in ($$visits_visitage_metadata_prism$$) ) age, ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$Participants pa, ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$PANIO iov, ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$MetaData m where least(pa.EUPATH_0000152, $$visit_date.max$$, pa.EFO_0004950 + ( age.max_age * 365)) - greatest(pa.EUPATH_0000151, $$visit_date.min$$, pa.EFO_0004950 + ( age.min_age * 365)) + 1 >= $$duration_observation$$ and pa.pan_id = iov.input_pan_id and iov.output_pan_id in ($$visits_visitage_metadata_prism$$) and pa.pan_id = m.pan_id

sqlQuery.name: ParticipantMetaDataBkgd_prism
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct m.pan_id as internal, iov.output_pan_id as internal_for_counts, m.property_source_id as ontology_term_name, m.string_value, m.number_value, m.date_value from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$PANIO iov, ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$MetaData m where iov.output_pan_type_source_id = 'EUPATH_0000738' and iov.input_pan_type_source_id = 'EUPATH_0000096' and iov.input_pan_id = m.pan_id

sqlQuery.name: VisitMetaData_prism
sqlQuery.sql: select m.pan_id as internal, m.pan_id as internal_for_counts, m.property_source_id as ontology_term_name, m.string_value, m.number_value, m.date_value from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$MetaData m where m.pan_id in ($$households_prism$$) union all select ios.input_pan_id as internal, ios.input_pan_id as internal_for_counts, m.property_source_id as ontology_term_name, m.string_value, m.number_value, m.date_value from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$MetaData m, ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$PANIO ios where m.category = 'Specimen type' and m.property_source_id = 'OBI_0100051' and ios.input_pan_id in ($$households_prism$$) and ios.output_pan_id = m.pan_id

sqlQuery.name: ParticipantMetaData_maled
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct m.pan_id as internal, m.pan_id as internal_for_counts, m.property_source_id as ontology_term_name, m.string_value, m.number_value, m.date_value from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$MetaData m where m.dataset_name = 'ISASimple_Gates_MAL-ED_stdm_tp_RSRC' --$$dataset$$ and m.category = 'Participant' and m.pan_id in ($$geographic_region_maled$$)

sqlQuery.name: ParticipantMetaDataBkgd_maled
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct m.pan_id as internal, m.pan_id as internal_for_counts, m.property_source_id as ontology_term_name, m.string_value, m.number_value, m.date_value from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$MetaData m where m.dataset_name = 'ISASimple_Gates_MAL-ED_stdm_tp_RSRC' --$$dataset$$ and m.category = 'Participant'

sqlQuery.name: VisitMetaData_maled
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct m.pan_id as internal, m.pan_id as internal_for_counts, source_id as ontology_term_name, string_value, number_value, date_value from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$MetaData m where m.dataset_name = 'ISASimple_Gates_MAL-ED_stdm_tp_RSRC' --$$dataset$$ and m.category = 'Event' and m.pan_id in ($$households_nf_maled$$)

sqlQuery.name: VisitMetaDataBkgd_maled
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct m.pan_id as internal, m.pan_id as internal_for_counts, source_id as ontology_term_name, string_value, number_value, date_value from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$MetaData m where m.dataset_name = 'ISASimple_Gates_MAL-ED_stdm_tp_RSRC' --$$dataset$$ and m.category = 'Event'

sqlQuery.name: RegionMetaData_maled
sqlQuery.sql: select io.part_id as internal, io.event_id as internal_for_counts, m.property_source_id as ontology_term_name, m.string_value, m.number_value, m.date_value from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$MetaData m, ( select distinct io.input_pan_id as hh_id, io.output_pan_id as part_id, ioe.output_pan_id as event_id from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$PANIO io, ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$PANIO ioe where io.input_pan_type_source_id = 'PCO_0000024' and io.output_pan_id = ioe.input_pan_id and ioe.output_pan_type_source_id = 'EUPATH_0000738') io where m.pan_id = io.hh_id and m.dataset_name = 'ISASimple_Gates_MAL-ED_stdm_tp_RSRC' --$$dataset$$ and lower(m.category) = 'Household' and m.property_source_id in ('EUPATH_0000054','OBI_0001627','EUPATH_0000452')

sqlQuery.name: HouseholdMetaData_maled
sqlQuery.sql: select io.part_id as internal, io.part_id as internal_for_counts, m.property_source_id as ontology_term_name, m.string_value, m.number_value, m.date_value from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$MetaData m, ( select distinct io.input_pan_id as hh_id, io.output_pan_id as part_id from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$PANIO io where io.output_pan_id in ($$participants_nf_maled$$) and io.input_pan_type_source_id = 'PCO_0000024') io where m.pan_id = io.hh_id and m.dataset_name = 'ISASimple_Gates_MAL-ED_stdm_tp_RSRC' --$$dataset$$ and lower(m.category) = 'Household'

sqlQuery.name: HouseholdMetaDataBkgd_maled
sqlQuery.sql: select io.part_id as internal, io.part_id as internal_for_counts, m.property_source_id as ontology_term_name, m.string_value, m.number_value, m.date_value from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$MetaData m, ( select distinct io.input_pan_id as hh_id, io.output_pan_id as part_id from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$PANIO io where io.output_pan_type_source_id = 'EUPATH_0000096' and io.input_pan_type_source_id = 'PCO_0000024') io where m.pan_id = io.hh_id and m.dataset_name = 'ISASimple_Gates_MAL-ED_stdm_tp_RSRC' --$$dataset$$ and lower(m.category) = 'Household'

sqlQuery.name: RelVisitOntology_maled
sqlQuery.sql: select * from ( with leaf as ( select o.ontology_term_source_id as ontology_term_name, o.parent_ontology_term_source_id as parent_ontology_term_name, nvl(o.display_name,o.ontology_term_name) as display_name, o.description, o.units,o.type,o.is_range,o.precision from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$Ontology o, (select distinct term from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$MetaData where dataset_name = 'ISASimple_Gates_MAL-ED_stdm_tp_RSRC' --$$dataset$$ and category = 'Event' and source_id != 'EUPATH_0000094') md where o.ontology_term_name = md.term), first as ( select o.ontology_term_source_id as ontology_term_name, o.parent_ontology_term_source_id as parent_ontology_term_name, nvl(o.display_name,o.ontology_term_name) as display_name, o.description, o.units,o.type,o.is_range,o.precision from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$Ontology o, (select distinct parent_ontology_term_name from leaf where parent_ontology_term_name is not null) par where o.ontology_term_source_id = par.parent_ontology_term_name), second as ( select o.ontology_term_source_id as ontology_term_name, o.parent_ontology_term_source_id as parent_ontology_term_name, nvl(o.display_name,o.ontology_term_name) as display_name, o.description, o.units,o.type,o.is_range,o.precision from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$Ontology o, (select distinct parent_ontology_term_name from first where parent_ontology_term_name is not null) gpar where o.ontology_term_source_id = gpar.parent_ontology_term_name) select * from leaf union select * from first union select * from second union select o.ontology_term_source_id as ontology_term_name, o.parent_ontology_term_source_id as parent_ontology_term_name, nvl(o.display_name,o.ontology_term_name) as display_name, o.description, o.units,o.type,o.is_range,o.precision from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$Ontology o, (select distinct parent_ontology_term_name from second where parent_ontology_term_name is not null) ggpar where o.ontology_term_source_id = ggpar.parent_ontology_term_name ) order by ontology_term_name

sqlQuery.name: RelVisitMetaData_maled
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct pan_id as internal, pan_id as internal_for_counts, source_id as ontology_term_name, string_value, number_value, date_value from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$MetaData where dataset_name = 'ISASimple_Gates_MAL-ED_stdm_tp_RSRC' --$$dataset$$ and category = 'Event'
